snippet.title: Ex Astris Launch Date Trailer: Starting Feb 27, Re-embark on an Extraterrestrial Quest
snippet.description:
How do memories become a heavy burden? How do particles of Astrite evolve into lifeforms? 

Investigator from Earth, gear up for a renewed journey in the world of Allindo. 

Meet diverse companions on this quest and form a cohesive team. Use the combined strength of your party to quell the Storm through the rite of Recording.

#ExAstris
————————
Ex Astris is real-time / turn-based hybrid premium 3D RPG published by GRYPHLINE. 
Assuming the role of an Investigator, you will set out on an extraterrestrial quest in the world of Allindo. 
Official Website: https://exa.gryphline.com/en-us/
We look forward to meeting you on an epic odyssey in search of the truth.
